overview: Journalist Emily Siu searches for the ghosts thought to dwell hidden in the clouds of incense fume and firecracker smoke amongst the modern Macao metropolis. She encounters people who have learnt the healing arts of the occult but begins to feel the grasp of the supernatural on her own psyche.
tagline: They live among us, hidden in a city underneath clouds of incense fume and firecracker smoke, lost in time, slowly getting closer….
title: Into the Void
